Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Lightning strike damage assessment. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 17/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
